prompt: Photorealistic image: A professional art appraiser, middle-aged with glasses, meticulously examines the brushstrokes of a large, ornate Baroque oil painting using a magnifying glass. The scene is set in a well-lit, classic study or gallery room. Soft, directional lighting highlights the texture of the canvas and the appraiser's focused expression. Composition follows the rule of thirds, placing the appraiser and the point of examination off-center, allowing the grandeur of the painting and the professional environment to fill the 16:9 frame. Shallow depth of field blurs the background bookshelves and antique furniture slightly. Style: Cinematic realism, professional tone. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraisals-image-1.png

prompt: Photorealistic image: A wide shot capturing the essential tools of an art appraiser laid out neatly on a large, polished mahogany desk. Items include a specialized magnifying lamp casting a warm glow, white cotton gloves, measuring tapes, calipers, art history reference books with worn spines, and a partially visible antique ceramic vase being assessed. Soft, natural light streams in from a large window to the left, illuminating dust motes in the air. The composition uses the desk surface as the primary plane, stretching across the 16:9 frame, creating a sense of order and expertise. Style: Still life, high detail, professional atmosphere. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraisals-image-2.png

prompt: Photorealistic image: An art appraiser, elegantly dressed, stands discussing a modern abstract sculpture with a client in a bright, minimalist contemporary art gallery. The appraiser gestures towards the sculpture, which is centrally placed but slightly recessed, while the client listens attentively. The wide 16:9 composition emphasizes the clean lines and spaciousness of the gallery setting, with large white walls and subtle track lighting. The interaction feels collaborative and informative. Style: Architectural photography influence, clean, bright, professional interaction. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraisals-image-3.png

prompt: Photorealistic image: Over-the-shoulder view of an art appraiser working at a computer in a modern office setting, finalizing a digital appraisal report. The screen displays images of artwork, data charts, and text. Beside the monitor, physical photographs of the artwork and detailed notes are spread out. A small, authenticated artifact (e.g., a historical print) rests nearby under a desk lamp. The 16:9 frame captures the desk environment, the glow of the monitor, and the appraiser's hands typing, emphasizing the research and documentation aspect. Style: Office realism, tech-focused, detailed documentation. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraisals-image-4.png

prompt: Photorealistic image: Close-up on the hands of an art appraiser holding a tablet displaying an online art database or appraisal software interface, comparing it against a vibrant impressionist painting resting on an easel in the background. The background shows a comfortable, art-filled living room or private collection space, slightly out of focus. The lighting is warm and inviting, perhaps late afternoon sun. The 16:9 composition focuses attention on the juxtaposition of the physical artwork and the digital analysis tool, filling the frame horizontally. Style: Lifestyle photography, warm lighting, modern appraisal methods focus. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraisals-image-5.png
